<h3 id="X34707">X(34707) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: EULER TO ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 7*a^4-(5*b^2+8*b*c+5*c^2)*a^2+4*(b+c)*b*c*a-2*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34707) = 7*X(3)-4*X(3813) = 3*X(381)-2*X(34706) = X(382)-4*X(8715) = X(1657)+2*X(3913) = 3*X(3534)-2*X(34620) = 5*X(3811)-2*X(28645) = 4*X(3829)-5*X(15694) = 3*X(4421)-X(34706) = 3*X(5054)-2*X(11235) = X(5073)-4*X(12607) = 3*X(10246)-2*X(34640) = 3*X(34607)-X(34619) = X(34620)-3*X(34626) = 4*X(34620)-3*X(34740) = 4*X(34626)-X(34740)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34706)</p>
<p>X(34707) lies on these lines:
{2,9669}, {3,528}, {30,10306}, {35,31140}, {55,17528}, {56,34719}, {84,28204}, {100,9668}, {381,4421}, {382,8715}, {497,17564}, {515,34639}, {517,34701}, {519,3534}, {529,15681}, {535,1657}, {550,34610}, {551,19706}, {943,17532}, {952,34711}, {956,20095}, {999,20075}, {1479,6174}, {2475,31480}, {3058,16417}, {3149,34629}, {3158,28146}, {3295,11112}, {3679,31445}, {3811,28534}, {3829,15694}, {3830,18542}, {3871,9655}, {4294,9709}, {4299,34749}, {4302,6154}, {4309,16408}, {4930,28194}, {5054,11235}, {5073,12607}, {5687,11114}, {7957,15071}, {8703,34625}, {9708,11111}, {9945,30305}, {10246,34640}, {11194,15688}, {12513,15696}, {12632,17538}, {12675,25413}, {12953,31160}, {14377,17313}, {15338,34720}, {15720,24387}, {16371,34611}, {16418,34612}, {17571,31494}, {17577,31479}, {24466,30283}, {25440,34649}, {25568,28178}, {28202,28609}</p>
<p>
X(34707) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (381, 4421), (382, 11236), (3534, 34626), (11236, 8715), (34610, 550), (34625, 8703), (34740, 3534)<br>
X(34707) = {X(34607), X(34654)}-harmonic conjugate of X(34703)<br>
</p>
